newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Bank of Korea supplies 1.1 trln won to banks.
newsitem.headline: Bank of Korea supplies 1.1 trln won to banks.

text.p: The central Bank of Korea on Wednesday supplied 1.1 trillion won to commercial banks through two-day repurchase agreements to help ease liquidity shortage, an official at the bank said.
The repurchase agreements will mature on November 22, a deadline for the central bank's twice-monthly review of reserve requirement levels at banks, he said.
"Banks having liquidity shortages asked us for an emergency fund and I expect today's fund supply was sufficient to ease their fund shortage," he said.
